# Revitalize Legacy, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[9th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 9]], [[9th Level Druid Spells|Druid 9]], [[9th Level Shugenja Spells|Shugenja 9]], [[9th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 9]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]], [[9th Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 19th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 19]], [[BoXM 19th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 19]], [[BoXM 19th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 19]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Your legacy item; see text

**Duration:** 1 hour/level or until expended

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Weapons of Legacy (WotC), pg. 17

This spell functions like *[[Revitalize Legacy, Least (Spell)|least revitalize legacy]]*, except that you regain one daily use of a chosen greater legacy ability.
